name: Teddiursa
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.

attacks.name: Fake Tears
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can’t play any Trainer cards from his or her hand during your opponent’s next turn, and any damage done to Teddiursa by attack is reduced by 30 (after applying weakness and resistance).
